name: narthex
description: You stand in the *narthex*. The room is cavernous and it's air murky. Particles of dust bob slowly in shafts of light from the ceiling. The cool stone floor is caked in dust with hundreds of bare footprints running in all directions. Looking west you see a bricked-over portico. Looking east you see a bright rectangle shining in the middle of the marble wall. In each corner of the room a pile of debris.

sections.name: northeast
sections.description: This corner of the *narthex* is so dark you can barely see your fingers before your face. The air is moist yet bitterly cold. There is a pile of rusty old swords at your feet. One _bronze dagger_ seems serviceable. Perhaps you should take it with you?

commands.name: cry
commands.description: You are possessed by the spirit of sorrow and cry plump soggy tears uncontrolably.

sections.name: northwest
sections.description: This corner of the *narthex* is so dark you can barely see your fingers before your face. The air is moist yet bitterly cold. There is a pile of battered shields at your feet. One _wooden buckler_ seems in good condition. Perhaps you should take it with you?

commands.name: swoon
commands.description: You are possessed by the spirit of weakness and nearly fall to the floor in a heap.

sections.name: east
sections.description: There a large _silver door_ here set in the wall.

commands.name: golden knob
commands.description: You grab the golden knob and try to turn it left and right. It doesn't budge. You grab it again with both hands and with mightly twist the knob slowly grinds to the right. The silver door gently opens inward into inky darkness.

commands.name: silver door
commands.description: You step up to the gleaming silver door. In its center you see a _golden knob_. You wonder what is on the other side and if the low moaning you hear is coming from the next room?

sections.name: center
sections.description: You stand in the center of the *narthex*; in a pool of bright warm light. All around you are shadowy vales that the light does not penetrate. The scent of decay and age drifts in from each corner of the room. Something bright shines on the east wall but behind it you hear a low chorus of anguished moans.

commands.name: dance
commands.description: You are possessed by the spirit of dance and twirl and whirl without embarrassment.

commands.name: northeast
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _northeast_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: northwest
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _northwest_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: southeast
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _southeast_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: southwest
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _southwest_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: east
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _east_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: west
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _west_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.

commands.name: center
commands.description: You !MOVING_VERB !MOVING_ADVERB through the !GAME_ATMOSPHERE room to the _center_ section of the *!ROOM_NAME*.
